name: SLAY (itch) (AnarchyGames)
description:
They say looks can kill... But they don't know how right that saying is.

France is in ruins. Landmarks are falling. It's anarchy.

No one knows what to wear.

Code by @AnarchyGames, art by @Dorleing

[Version 1.0] Absolute Bare Minimum Jam Edition (buggy, will update soon)
